sentences.cn: 一张张满怀期待的面孔

sentences.en: children with expectant faces waiting for the fireworks to begin
sentences.cn: 带着期盼的神情等待烟火表演的孩子们

sentences.en: Do adopt expectant, hopeful , even slightly anxious facial expression.
sentences.cn: 你脸上可以流露等待 、 期望, 甚至略带焦虑的表情.

sentences.en: Even the coconut trees seemed swollen and expectant.
sentences.cn: 连椰子树都似乎憋得头昏脑胀,巴望能舒上一口气.

sentences.en: His voice was mild but it had an expectant fearful quality in it.
sentences.cn: 他的口气很婉转,但是听得出有些担心而暗带提防的意思.

sentences.en: Mother eyed Jim with an eager, expectant smile.
sentences.cn: 母亲带着殷切期望的微笑注视着吉姆.

sentences.en: On the instant those at the table were keyed up and expectant to him.
sentences.cn: 席上的人们一下子鼓起劲儿来了,对他眼巴巴地望着.

sentences.en: Philip paced the floor, a typically nervous expectant father.
sentences.cn: 菲利普在地板上踱来踱去，一副典型的神经紧张的准爸爸形象。

sentences.en: She turned to me with an expectant look on her face.
sentences.cn: 她转身望着我，脸上带着期待的表情。

sentences.en: Stumpy stepped before the expectant crowd.
sentences.cn: 斯顿皮一步跨到等着看热闹的人群面前.

sentences.en: The expectant crowds in the streets waited patiently for the queen.
sentences.cn: 街上期待的人群耐心地等待着女皇.

sentences.en: The expectant crowds waited for the king and his queen to pass.
sentences.cn: 期待的人群等候国王和皇后经过.

sentences.en: The expectant father is thinking of buying infant cloth.
sentences.cn: 那个即将做爸爸的人在考虑买婴儿穿的衣服.

sentences.en: The expectant mothers that Amy had encountered positively glowed with pride.
sentences.cn: 埃米遇见的准妈妈们个个洋溢着自豪和喜悦。

sentences.en: The sparrow huddles up , motionless, its eyes as black as ever, still expectant.
sentences.cn: 小鸟不动, 蜷着身,两眼还那么黑, 等着!

sentences.en: There was a stir in the air and a sense of expectant gaiety.
sentences.cn: 这里气氛活跃,充满了寻欢作乐的情调.

trans.tran_en: hopeful that something good or exciting will happen, or showing this
